data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Do your best and then let life do the rest.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Anyone can be a critic. What takes guts is to see the best in people.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Your habits are driving your performance. Your rituals are creating your results.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Silence is the place productive people go to think.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Greatness comes by beginning something that doesn’t end with you.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Leadership is not a title, it’s a behavior.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Your results are dependent on your devotion.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Have the guts to be true to yourself.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Blaming others is excusing yourself.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: What makes genius is not just the idea, but the execution around the idea to bring it to the world.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Never sacrifice happiness for the sake of achievement. The real key to life is to happily achieve.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Never be too busy to be kind.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: You can’t get to your next best self by clinging to who you were yesterday.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Time management is life management.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: To double your net worth, double your self-worth. Because you will never exceed the height of your self-image.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Defeat only happens when you stop believing.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Focus on being superb at what you do and, over time you will be known as remarkable.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Rewarding yourself with good things sends a message to the deepest, and the highest, part of you. One that says, ‘I’m worth it, I deserve it’.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: You were born into genius. Don’t settle for any mediocrity.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Make your life matter. Be of use. Serve as many people as possible. This is how each of us can shift from the ordinary to the extraordinary and walk amongst the best who ever lived.
